body.p: The Editor of Bentley’sRichard Bentley (1794-1871; Dictionary of National Biography), one of the most prominent of Victorian publishers: see Pilgrim Letters 1, p. 164n; for CD’s stormy relationship with him see PIlgrim Letters 1, passim.
